tuv.seg: If you do not qualify for a medical card you may be eligible for a GP visit card
Mura gcáilítear thú do chárta leighis, d’fhéadfá bheith i dteideal Cárta Cuairte LG a fháil
A GP visit card allows you to visit a participating family doctor for free
Ceadaíonn Cárta Cuairte LG duit cuairt a thabhairt ar LG rannpháirteach saor in aisce
Unless you have a medical card or a GP visit card, visits to GPs are not free
Chun cáiliú do Chárta Cuairte LG, ní mór duit na rialacha incháilitheachta thíos a chomhlíonadh agus gnáthchónaí a bheith ort in Éirinn
In order to qualify for a GP visit card, you must meet the eligibility rules below and be ordinarily resident in Ireland
Is é sin, ní mór go bhfuil cónaí ort, nó go mbeartaíonn tú cónaí a bheith ort in Éirinn ar feadh bliain amháin, ar a laghad
If you are aged under 70, you must also meet specific income guidelines
Má tá tú faoi 70 bliain d’aois, ní mór duit treoirlínte sonracha ioncaim a chomhlíonadh chomh maith
If you are aged over 70, the GP visit card is available without an income test
Ón 5 Lúnasa 2015, má tá tú 70 bliain d’aois nó os a chionn, tá fáil ar an gcárta cuairte LG gan bheith ort tabhairt faoi thástáil ioncaim
The GP visit card for children under 6 is available to all children under the age of 6
Tá fáil ar an gcárta cuairte LG do leanaí faoi 6 bliana d’aois do gach leanbh faoi aois 6 bliana
Having a GP visit card only allows you to visit your GP for free
Trí chárta cuairte LG a bheith agat, ceadaítear duit cuairt a thabhairt ar do LG saor in aisce
Prescribed drugs are not free but may be covered by the Drugs Payment Scheme
Níl drugaí ordaithe saor in aisce ach d’fhéadfaidís a bheith cumhdaithe ag an Scéim Íocaíochta Drugaí
The GP visit card does not cover hospital charges
Ní chumhdaíonn an cárta cuairte LG muirir ospidéil
It does cover visits to GP out of hours services
Ní chumhdaíonn sé cuairteanna chuig seirbhísí lasmuigh d’uaireanta LG
Blood tests to diagnose or monitor a condition are covered
Cumhdaítear tástálacha fola chun diagnóisiú nó monatóireacht a dhéanamh ar riocht
The GP visit card is available to everyone aged over 70 without an income test
Tá an cárta cuairte LG ar fáil do gach duine atá 70 bliain d’aois nó os a chionn sin gan tástáil ioncaim a dhéanamh orthu
If you are under 70, eligibility for the GP visit card is means tested. That is, your income is assessed by the HSE as part of the application process
Tá fáil ar an gcárta cuairte LG do leanaí faoi aois 6 bliana do gach leanbh atá faoi aois 6 bliana
Income limits for people aged under 70
Má tá tú faoi 70 bliain d’aois, déantar tástáil mhaoine ar incháilitheacht don chárta cuairte LG

The rules for assessing the amount of your income are the same as for the medical card means test for people aged under 70 but the income limits for the GP visit card are higher than the limits for the medical card
Teorainneacha Ioncaim do dhaoine faoi bhun 70
GP visit card weekly income limit (gross less tax, USC and PRSI)
Teorainn sheachtainiúil ioncaim don Chárta Cuairte LG (ollioncam lúide cáin, MSU agus
│Category │Aged under │Aged │
│ │Daoine faoi │Daoine idir 66 │
│Single person living alone │€276 │€302 │
│Duine singil a chónaíonn leis/léi féin │€276 │€302 │
│Single person living with family │€246 │€260 │
│Duine singil a chónaíonn lena t(h)eaghlach │€246 │€260 │
│Married or cohabiting couple (or lone parent with dependent │€400 │€447 │
│Lánúin phósta nó chomhchónaithe (nó tuismitheoir │€400 │€447 │
│children) │ │ │
│aonair ag a bhfuil leanaí cleithiúnaí) │ │ │
│Allowance for each of first 2 children aged under 16 │€57 │€57 │
│Liúntas le haghaidh gach duine den chéad bheirt │€57 │€57 │
│Allowance for 3rd and for each subsequent child under 16 │€61.50 │€61.50 │
│leanaí faoi bhun 16 │ │ │
│Allowance for each of first 2 children aged over 16 (with no │€58.50 │€58.50 │
│Liúntas le haghaidh gach duine den chéad bheirt │€58.50 │€58.50 │
│income) │ │ │
│leanaí os cionn 16 (gan ioncam ar bith) │ │ │
│Allowance for 3rd and for each subsequent child over 16 (with│€64 │€64 │
│leanbh os cionn 16 ina dhiaidh sin (gan ioncam ar│€64 │€64 │
│no income) │ │ │
│bith) │ │ │
│Each dependant over 16 years in full-time non-grant aided │€117 │€117 │
│Gach cleithiúnaí os cionn 16 atá ag tabhairt faoi│ │ │
│third-level │ │ │
│deontais │ │ │
There are also allowances for reasonable expenses incurred in respect of childcare costs and rent/mortgage payments
Anuas air sin, tá liúntais ann le haghaidh costais réasúnta a thabhaítear maidir le costais chúram leanaí agus íocaíochtaí cíosa/morgáiste
Allowances for weekly travel costs to work are assessed as the actual cost of public transport or, if a car is required, as mileage at 30 cent per mile (18 cent per km)
Déantar measúnú ar liúntais sheachtainiúla taistil chuig an obair mar chostas iarbhír iompair phoiblí, nó míleáiste amhail 30 cent sa mhíle (18 cent sa km)
Dependants of people aged over 70
Cleithiúnaithe daoine os cionn 70 bliain d’aois

If you are aged over 70 and you have dependants, for example a spouse, civil partner or cohabiting partner aged under 70, your dependants may qualify for a GP visit card if your income is below a certain level

Má tá tú os cionn 70 bliain d’aois agus má tá cleithiúnaithe agat, mar shampla, céile, páirtnéir sibhialta nó páirtnéir comhchónaithe atá faoi aois 70 bliain, b’fhéidir go gcáileofar do chleithiúnaithe do chárta cuairte LG má tá d’ioncam faoi bhun leibhéal áirithe

The rules for assessing the amount of your income are the same as for the medical card means test for people aged under 70 but the income limits for the GP visit card are higher than the limits for the medical card

Is ionann na rialacha chun measúnú a dhéanamh ar mhéid d’ioncaim agus na rialacha i dtaobh na tástála maoine don chárta leighis i measc daoine faoi bhun 70 bliain d’aois, ach tá na teorainneacha ioncaim don chárta cuairte LG níos airde ná na teorainneacha don chárta leighis
If you have a spouse, civil partner or cohabiting partner, the limit for your combined income is €1,400 per week, not including the first €72,000 of savings or similar investments

Má tá céile, páirtnéir sibhialta nó páirtnéir comhchónaithe agat, is é an teorainn ar bhur gcomhioncam €1,400 sa tseachtain, gan an chéad €72,000 de choigilteas nó a chomhionann d’infheistíochtaí a áireamh
If you do not have a spouse, civil partner or cohabiting partner, the income limit is €700 per week, not including the first €36,000 of savings or similar investments
Mura bhfuil céile, páirtnéir sibhialta nó páirtnéir comhchónaithe agat, is é an teorainn €700 sa tseachtain, gan an chéad €36,000 de choigilteas nó a chomhionann d’infheistíochtaí a áireamh
Income over the limit
Ioncam os cionn na teorann
When you apply for a GP visit card you will first be assessed for eligibility for a medical card
Nuair a dhéanann tú iarratas ar Chárta Cuairte LG, déanfar measúnú ort i dtosach báire le haghaidh teidlíochta do chárta leighis
If your income is over the relevant limit, the deciding officer will consider whether it would cause you undue hardship if you are refused a medical card
Má tá d’ioncam os cionn na teorann cuí, déanfaidh an t-oifigeach cinntitheach breithniú ar cibé acu an mbeadh nó nach mbeadh sé ina údar le cruatan míchuí duit má dhiúltaítear cárta leighis duit
If you don’t qualify for a medical card you are then assessed for a GP visit card
Mura gcáilíonn tú do chárta leighis, déantar measúnú ort le haghaidh Cárta Cuairte LG
If your income is over the relevant limit, the deciding officer will consider whether it would be 'unduly burdensome' for you to pay for GP Services if you don’t have a GP visit card

Má tá d’ioncam os cionn na teorann cuí, déanfaidh an t-oifigeach cinntitheach breithniú ar cibé acu an mbeadh nó nach mbeadh sé ‘ina chruatan míchuí’ ort íoc as Seirbhísí LG mura bhfuil Cárta Cuairte LG agat
If your application for a GP visit card is refused, you will receive a letter from the HSE stating this
Má dhiúltaítear d’iarratas ar Chárta Cuairte LG, gheobhaidh tú litir ó FSS ina luaitear seo
The letter will also set out the reasons why your application has been refused
Anuas air sin, leagtar amach sa litir seo na cúiseanna ar diúltaíodh d’iarratas
If you are not satisfied with the decision, you may have it reviewed
Mura bhfuil tú sásta leis an gcinneadh, féadfaidh tú iarraidh go ndéanfar athbhreithniú air
Your circumstances may have changed or you may have left out some relevant information from the original application
D’fhéadfadh gur tháinig athrú ar do chúinsí, nó d’fhéadfadh gur fhág tú roinnt faisnéis ábhartha ar lár ón mbuniarratas
If you are not satisfied with the review you may make an appeal to the Appeals Office of your HSE Area
Mura bhfuil tú sásta leis an athbhreithniú, féadfaidh tú achomharc a dhéanamh le hOifig Achomhairc do Cheantar FSS
The contact details will also be contained in your letter of refusal
Beidh na sonraí teagmhála le sonrú i do litir dhiúltaithe, chomh maith
The Appeals Office will conduct a reassessment of your application
Tabharfaidh an Oifig Achomhairc faoi athmheasúnú ar d’iarratas
This will be conducted by HSE staff who were not involved in deciding on your original application
Tabharfaidh foireann FSS faoi seo, nach raibh baint acu leis an gcinneadh a dhéanamh ar do bhuniarratas
Your entitlement to a GP visit card is reviewed periodically
Déantar athbhreithniú tréimhsiúil ar do theidlíocht chun Cárta Cuairte LG a fháil
This is because your circumstances may change
Déantar seo mar gheall go bhféadfadh athrú teacht ar chúinsí
If you don’t return your review form, your GP visit card may not be re-issued
Mura seolann tú d'fhoirm athbhreithnithe ar ais, b'fhéidir nach n-atheiseofar do Chárta Cuairte LG

If you return your review form by the given date but the review process continues past the expiry date of your card, the card’s validity may be extended so that you can continue to use it while the review is taking place

Má sheolann tú d’fhoirm athbhreithnithe ar ais faoin dáta a luaitear ach má leanann an próiseas athbhreithnithe thar dháta éagtha do chárta, féadtar bailíocht an chárta a shíneadh ionas gur féidir leat leanúint le hé a úsáid fad atá an t-athbhreithniú ar bun
The extension is on a month-by-month basis so it is advisable to contact the Client Registration Unit to confirm that your card has been extended and continues to be valid
Tá an síneadh ar bhonn mí ar mhí, mar sin, moltar duit teagmháil a dhéanamh leis an Aonad Cláraithe Cliant lena dheimhniú gur síneadh do chárta agus go leanann sé bheith bailí

For the GP visit card for people aged 70 and over, you can register for the card online on gpvisitcard.ie, you can download the registration form for people aged 70 and over (pdf) or you can call 1890 252 919 to request a registration form

I dtaobh an chárta cuairte LG do dhaoine 70 bliain d’aois agus níos sine, féadfaidh tú clárú don chárta ar líne ag gpvisitcard.ie, féadfaidh tú an fhoirm chlárúcháin a íoslódáil le haghaidh daoine atá 70 bliain d’aois agus níos sine (pdf) nó glao a chur chun iarraidh ar fhoirm chlárúcháin
If you are aged under 70, you use the same application process to apply for a GP visit card as for a medical card
Má tá tú faoi bhun 70 bliain d’aois, úsáideann tú an próiseas céanna chun iarratas a dhéanamh ar chárta cuairte LG a úsáidtear le haghaidh cárta leighis
As part of the application process for the GP visit card, your entitlement for a medical card will also be assessed
Mar chuid den phróiseas iarratais don chárta cuairte LG, déanfar measúnú, chomh maith, ar do theidlíocht do chárta leighis
You can apply online for a medical card or GP visit card on medicalcard.ie
Féadfaidh tú iarratas a dhéanamh ar líne ar chárta leighis nó ar Chárta Cuairte LG ag medicalcard.ie
This is the quickest method of obtaining the card
Seo an modh is tapúla chun an cárta a fháil
Otherwise, you can download an application form for a GP visit card and medical card:
Mar mhalairt air sin, féadfaidh tú foirm iarratais a íoslódáil le haghaidh Cárta Cuairte LG agus cárta leighis:
MC1 Medical Card/GP Visit Card Application Form (pdf)
Foirm Iarratais MC1 ar Chárta Leighis/Cárta Cuairte LG (pdf)
MC1(a) Medical Card/GP Visit Card Application Form - Persons Aged 70 Years or Older (pdf)
Foirm Iarratais MC1(a) ar Chárta Leighis/Cárta Cuairte LG – Daoine 70 Bliain D’Aois nó Níos Sine (pdf)
Contact Lo-call 1890 252 919 or your Local Health Office for more information on GP visit cards
Déan teagmháil le 1890 252 919 nó le d’Oifig Áitiúil Sláinte chun teacht ar bhreis faisnéise ar Chártaí Cuairte LG
You can also contact the Client Registration Unit
Ina theannta sin, féadfaidh tú teagmháil a dhéanamh leis an Aonad Cláraithe Cliant
